start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Aah... Good morning!

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: Morning!

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: And what a heartbreaking morning it is...

branch.name: Navigator:
branch.content: Heartbreaking? Are we talking about cats, here?

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: My kitten's sleeping. I don't want to disturb it, but I really want to touch it...

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: Erm... If this kind of thing breaks your heart...

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: Why don't you just find something else to do?

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Hey now! That's a good idea!

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Thanks a bunch! I'll go find someone else's cat!

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: What a cat fanatic... So utterly hopeless...

branch.name: Navigator:
branch.content: Heartbreaking? Are we talking about cats, here?

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: You bet it is!

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: My kitten's sleeping. I don't want to disturb it, but I really want to touch it...

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: Erm... If this kind of thing breaks your heart...

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: Why don't you just find something else to do?

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Hey now! That's a good idea!

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Thanks a bunch! I'll go find someone else's cat!

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: What a cat fanatic... So utterly hopeless...

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Hey, have you had lunch yet?

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: Not yet.

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Huh? Why haven't you eaten yet?

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: I—

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: You can have mine, if you want!

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: Look how healthy it is! Vegetable soup and gluten-free bread!

start.name: Korgon:
start.content: But it might taste a tiny bit strange... My cat was lapping at it a little. You don't mind, do you?

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: I'm good, thanks!

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: I'm going to eat now... thank you!
